item.description:
This is TODAY folks. You couldn't ask for a better day to be on Boston Harbor and to be sailing for FREE. Get down there and enjoy it!


Free Sailing Open House

... Saturday, May 19, 2012.
1:00 to 5:00pm

Open House at the Boston Sailing Center
www.bostonsailingcenter.com
The Boston Sailing Center is a sailing school and club located at Lewis Wharf on Boston Harbor. We offer courses at all levels from Learn to Sail to offshore racing and Membership in the Center which gives you access to our 60 boat fleet ranging in size from 23 to 40 feet.
item.how_to_find_us: Boston Sailing Center Free Sailing Open House
item.name: Boston Sailing Center Free Sailing Open House
